math.alttext: A_{\rm s,spot}(r_{\ast},r_{\rm spot},f)={\int_{0}^{2\pi}\int_{0}^{r_{\ast}}A_{% {\rm s},0}(\left|{\bf r}-{\bf r}_{L}\right|)rdrd\vartheta-f\int_{0}^{2\pi}\int% _{0}^{r_{\rm spot}}A_{{\rm s},0}(\left|{\bf r^{\prime}}-{\bf r}_{L}\right|)r^{% \prime}dr^{\prime}d\vartheta^{\prime}\over\pi(r_{\ast}^{2}-fr_{\rm spot}^{2})}.

A_{\rm s,spot}(r_{\ast},r_{\rm spot},f)={\int_{0}^{2\pi}\int_{0}^{r_{\ast}}A_{% {\rm s},0}(\left|{\bf r}-{\bf r}_{L}\right|)rdrd\vartheta-f\int_{0}^{2\pi}\int% _{0}^{r_{\rm spot}}A_{{\rm s},0}(\left|{\bf r^{\prime}}-{\bf r}_{L}\right|)r^{% \prime}dr^{\prime}d\vartheta^{\prime}\over\pi(r_{\ast}^{2}-fr_{\rm spot}^{2})}.
